{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Open-Mesh |model=MR600 |revision= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao <!--(EnGenius Technologies)--> |fcc_date=07/31/2012 |fcc_id=A8J-EAP600 |ic_id=10103A-EAP600 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9382;AR9382-AL1A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=open-mesh |default_ssid_regex=^open-mesh$ |default_user=root |default_pass=0p3nm35h |oui=AC:66:74 |oui_eth=AC:66:74 }} *[http://www.engeniustech.com/business-networking/indoor-access-points-client-bridges/16598-eap600-new Similar to EnGenius EAP600]
===Available Transmit Power=== <small> *As taken from the existing EnGenius model EAP600. :Needs verification from Open-Mesh for the MR600. *4x Internal Antenna (Peak Gain 5dBi) (Max. Power may be different depending on local regulations)
*802.11n (5 GHz) :27dBm @ MCS0~2/MCS8~10 :26dBm @ MCS3/MCS11 :25dBm @ MCS4/MCS12 :23dBm @ MCS5/MCS13 :22dBm @ MCS6/MCS14 :21dBm @ MCS7/MCS15
*802.11n (2.4 GHz) :27dBm @ MCS0~2/MCS8~10 :27dBm @ MCS3/MCS11 :26dBm @ MCS4/MCS12 :25dBm @ MCS5/MCS13 :24dBm @ MCS6/MCS14 :23dBm @ MCS7/MCS15
*802.11a (5 GHz) :26dBm @ 6~24Mbps :25dBm @ 36Mbps :23dBm @ 48Mbps :21dBm @ 54Mbps
*802.11b (2.4 GHz) :7dBm @ 1~11Mbps
===Receive Sensitivity=== *As taken from the existing EnGenius model EAP600. :Needs verification from Open-Mesh for the MR600. (Typical)
*802.11n (5 GHz) :-94dBm @ MCS0 :-76dBm @ MCS7 :-91dBm @ MCS8 :-73dBm @ MCS15
*802.11n (2.4 GHz) :-95dBm @ MCS0 :-77dBm @ MCS7 :-91dBm @ MCS8 :-75dBm @ MCS15
*802.11a (5 GHz) :-95dBm @ 6Mbps :-80dBm @ 54Mbps
*802.11b (2.4 GHz) :-95dBm @ 1Mbps :-91dBm @ 11Mbps </small>
